Rulings.Base:
1. When "Zoma the Spirit" is destroyed by battle, its effect activates when it is sent to the GY at the end of the Damage Step. This effect still activates if it is removed from play instead, due to "Macro Cosmos", etc. This effect starts a Chain.
2. When "Dark Ruler Ha Des" destroys "Zoma the Spirit" by battle, its effects are negated and it will not inflict damage.
3. When "Zoma the Spirit" is destroyed by battle, its owner activates its effect.
4. If a "Zoma the Spirit" is Special Summoned with "Magical Hats", its effect will not activate when it is destroyed in battle.
5. When an Attack Position "Zoma the Spirit" battles a monster with equal ATK and both monsters are destroyed, the effect of "Zoma the Spirit" still activates.
6. "Barrel Behind the Door" cannot be chained to the effect of "Zoma the Spirit".
7. "Divine Wrath" cannot be chained to the effect of "Zoma the Spirit" because it is a Trap Card in the GY.
8. The effect of "Sorcerer of Dark Magic" cannot be chained to the damage inflicting effect of "Zoma the Spirit".
9. The effect of  "Zoma the Spirit" cannot be negated by "Skill Drain".
10. The effect of "Des Volstgalph" does not activate when it destroys "Zoma the Spirit" by battle.
11. If "Zoma the Spirit" inflicts damage to your opponent's Life Points while "Begone, Knave!" is active, it will return to your hand. If the effect of "Makyura the Destructor" was activated during the same turn, it can be activated from the hand and Special Summoned. If "Final Attack Orders" is also active, it will be shifted into Attack Position and can then attack again during the same Battle Phase.
12. "Zoma the Spirit" inflicts damage equal to the current ATK of the monster that destroyed it by battle.
13. When "Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Beginning" destroys "Zoma the Spirit" by battle, it can activate its effect to attack once again.
14. When "Zoma the Spirit" is equipped to "Relinquished" by its effect, it is only treated as an Equip Spell Card, not a Trap Card or Monster Card.
15. While "Zoma the Spirit" is treated as an Effect Monster Card, it can be targeted with "Generation Shift" or "Next to Be Lost".
